#Top 500 Great Internet Mersenne Prime Search

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(XML)
library(ggplot2)
theurl <- "http://www.mersenne.org/report_top_500/"
tables <- readHTMLTable(theurl)
top.producers <- data.frame(Rank=as.numeric(as.character(tables$report1$'Rank')), Member=tables$report1$'Member Name',GHzD=as.numeric(as.character(tables$report1$'Total GHz Days')))
```

The  [Top 500 of GIMPS users](http://www.mersenne.org/report_top_500/) is updated every month. Users lend computing power to the computation of [Mersenne primes using the Prime95 program](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prime95)

As is usual in volunteer computing environments, there is a Zipf-like distribution, although it is not exactly a power law

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data=top.producers,aes(x=Rank,y=GHzD))+geom_point()+scale_y_log10()
```
